blueprint.label: 8-train LTN Depot Hub (fueled by coal train)

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description:
Calculate the average number of items per chest.
Using only the first car because a short-train could leave it empty while later cars make the station think it has capacity.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Count the number of trains currently waiting.

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description:
This is the LTN configuration:
- ID 255 matches networks 0-7 (binary 11111111)
- Request Priority is 0
- Provide threshold is huge (don't provide on overfill)
- Max-trains defaults to 1 (increase if you have stackers)
- Min-train-length is 2 (increase to only accept longer trains)

Max-train-length is set automatically.
